name: Gun Run 3D!
description:
Can you shoot them all?

Assemble your gun parts and reach unique weapons to destroy mobs. Try to merge all
parts and reach fever mode to win against the enemies. Upgrade your damage and fire
rate to overcome obstacles.

Claim your new and improved weapons to survive boss fights, blow away the barrels to get an advantage and explore unique levels. Dodge bullets and try to avoid getting hit.

Are you ready? Then start reloading your guns and jump into the action.

Take down all targets and challenge yourself with a high score!

Merge and Shoot
